item.tamg.pistol.tooltip.summary: A small and compact source of _firepower_
item.tamg.pistol.tooltip.behaviour1: Fires a _small bullet_ from your inventory and produces _heat_ up to the weapon's maximum capacity
item.tamg.pistol.tooltip.behaviour2: The gun will be _unusable_ for a few seconds
item.tamg.revolver.tooltip.summary: Its powerful shots _propel_ you in the _opposite_ direction of your target, Do _trickshots_!
item.tamg.revolver.tooltip.behaviour1: Fires a _heavy bullet_ from your inventory and produces _heat_ up to the weapon's maximum capacity
item.tamg.revolver.tooltip.behaviour2: The gun will be _unusable_ for a few seconds
